summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Digital Dream Works Agency homepage. All major functionality working correctly with only minor issues found.

ui_bugs.issue: Missing space in H1 text - shows 'Florida's GrowthInfrastructure' instead of 'Florida's Growth Infrastructure'

design_issues.issue: Missing 'sizes' prop warning in console for Unsplash images

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix minor H1 text spacing issue in HeroSection component. Add 'sizes' prop to Next.js Image components in NicheSlider. Consider updating Three.js Clock usage to Timer.
success_percentage: frontend: 95% (all major functionality working, only minor cosmetic issues)
